Tweaked.name: Spotify++
Tweaked.changelog:
• Added SpotifyNoPodcasts - Hides Podcasts from from Home and Library
• Added SpotifyHighQuality - Enables ’Very High’ Quality
• Added SpotifyAllowSettings - Enable all settings that are disabled when connected to another device
• Added Spoticentre - Centres the song/artist in now playing (Only working on some devices)
• Added TrueShuffle - Enables true random shuffling
Tweaked.description:
Spotify++ contants a tweak that activates Premium. As well as a number of tweaks to customise the UI and improve the overall user experience.

Here are the following tweaks:

• Spotilife - Premium for free.

• Sposify - A Tweak to customize your Spotify App UI and expand functionalities.

• Volify - Adds a volume slider to Spotify.

• SpotifyAllowSetting - Allows you to access all of the settings in Spotify that are normally disabled when someone else is playing music from another device.

• SpotifyNoPodcasts - Hides Podcasts from from Home and Library

• SpotifyHighQuality - Enables ’Very High’ Quality in Audio Quality settings

•TrueShuffle - Enables true random shuffling (Spotify prioritizes Songs you have listened to more often by default)

• Spoticentre - Centres the song/artist in now playing (Only working on some devices)
